titles.title: Shiokaze ni Naku Tatemono / Ani to Imouto / Sidecar wa Kimi no Yoyaku Seki / Sometimes I`m Happy / Santa no Quartet ga Yatte Kita
The Building That Cried in the Wind / Older Brother and Younger Sister / The Sidecar Is Reserved for You / Sometimes I`m Happy / Santa`s Quartet Has Come
汐風になく建物 / 兄と妹 / サイドカーはキミの予約席 / SOMETIMES I`M HAPPY / サンタのカルテットがやって来た
